channel.title: Akujiki Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Akujiki Village" - We are a really great village that will help whenever we can.

item.title: Re: Akujiki Village
item.content:encoded: We now have a Jonin Council, so come and enjoy it.

item.title: Re: Akujiki Village
item.content:encoded: Actually member of Kouensai a village with 7 upgrades can be great because they help new member and are friendly. Having a village is about creating a community and working together to achieve common goals. A village can not be an epic village with seven upgrades but it can be great.

item.title: Re: Akujiki Village
item.content:encoded:
how can a village be great with only 7 upgradesâ€¦..shouldent you say "aspies" to be great

ps. Kouensai has a jonin council and potions palace but we are humble =) we admit we aint great

item.title: Akujiki Village
item.content:encoded: We are in the war and need member to get a Jonin Council.
